translations: v.评论，议论；解释，解说；（计）注解，把（部分程序）转成注解（commentate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Also, Rowling described the Luna-commentated match as "the last Quidditch match."
sentences.translation: 而且罗琳会描写卢娜解说“魁地奇的最后一战”。

sentences.sentence: Other: Has had his own TV show, written newspaper columns and commentated on football matches.
sentences.translation: 其他：出演自己的电视剧，撰写报纸专栏并担任足球评论。

sentences.sentence: Mourinho has also had his own TV show, commentated on matches and delivered some outspoken newspaper columns.
sentences.translation: 穆里尼奥也有自己的电视节目，担任比赛评论和直言不讳地撰写报纸专栏。
